entries.title: Twitch called out for allowing users to create charity campaigns for nonprofits that some consider controversial
entries.description: Twitch has come under fire from some users for including a handful of controversial organizations listed under its Charity Tool.

entries.title: Former Twitter employee sentenced to more than three years in prison for spying for Saudi Arabia
entries.description: A former Twitter employee found guilty of spying on users on behalf of the Saudi royal family has been sentenced to three and a half years in prison.

entries.title: SEC says social media influencers used Twitter and Discord to manipulate stocks
entries.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission has charged seven social media influencers with securities fraud, saying Wednesday that they were part of a $100 million

entries.title: Facebook hit with $2 billion lawsuit connected to political violence in Africa
entries.description: A new lawsuit accuses Facebook of playing a role in political violence in Africa and seeks to hold it accountable by demanding more than $2 billion in
